verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H7802>Shoshannim-eduth,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thou that <S%H5090>leadest<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock;<s%> thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims,<s%> shine <S%H3313>forth.<s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> stir <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1369>strength,<s%> and <S%H1980>come<s%> and <S%H3444>save<s%> us.
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt thou be <S%H6225>angry<s%> against the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people?<s%>
Thou <S%H398>feedest<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears;<s%> and givest them <S%H1832>tears<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> in great <S%H7991>measure.<s%>
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4066>strife<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbors:<s%> and our <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H3932>laugh<s%> among themselves.
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5265>brought<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt:<s%> <S%H4714><s%> thou hast cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5193>planted<s%> it.
Thou <S%H6437>preparedst<s%> room <S%H6440>before<s%> it, and didst cause it to take deep <S%H8327>root,<s%> <S%H8328><s%> and it <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H2022>hills<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of it, and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> thereof were like the <S%H410>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedars.<s%>
She sent <S%H7971>out<s%> her <S%H7105>boughs<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and her <S%H3127>branches<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5104>river.<s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> hast thou then broken <S%H6555>down<s%> her <S%H1447>hedges,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> they which pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> do <S%H717>pluck<s%> her?
The <S%H2386>boar<s%> out of the <S%H4480>wood<s%> <S%H3293><s%> doth <S%H3765>waste<s%> it, and the wild <S%H2123>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> doth <S%H7462>devour<s%> it.

Return, <S%H7725><s%> we <S%H4994>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> look <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine;<s%>
And the <S%H3657>vineyard<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath <S%H5193>planted,<s%> and the <S%H1121>branch<s%> that thou madest <S%H553>strong<s%> for thyself.
It is <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> it is cut <S%H3683>down:<s%> they <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H4480>rebuke<s%> <S%H1606><s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

Let thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom thou madest <S%H553>strong<s%> for thyself.
So will <S%H3808>not<s%> we go <S%H5472>back<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> us, and we will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Turn us <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine;<s%> and we shall be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
